channel.title: Dungoneering Reward Question
channel.description:
[url=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Twisted_bird_skull_necklace]http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Twisted_bird_skull_necklace[/url] I was thinking of getting that necklace and prayer on box people at the duel arena. My stats would most likely be Atk:60 Str:30 Def:60 Pray:49
I would box pray on and when low prayer I would use the necklace and bury a bone, then use the redemption prayer 2 heal some hp, and repeat when needed. My question is will it let my bury bones in the arena or not?

item.title: Dungoneering Reward Question
item.dc:creator: @CanadaPkz CanadaPkz
item.description:
@CanadaPkz wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:4, topic:395936”]Are you joking with the strength level?[/quote]The reason the str would be like that is because thats how boxer stats are. The acc atm is 60atk 30 str 59 def and wins most of the time boxing.

@Snack- Id would just have my main do the dung for me will the staker leechs the xp

Read full topic

item.title: Dungoneering Reward Question
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“Snackman, post:5, topic:395936”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=493120.msg3605478#msg3605478 date=1306073407]
Are you joking with the strength level?
[/quote]

I must agree with him, your strength level will most likely be too low

At floor 1 - 19 it’d be fine, but when ur reaching high floors (around 40 or so) then you’d probably be killed because ur hits are too low to kill him…

And yeah, the necklace and bonecrusher sound pretty epic I might get them myself too :P[/quote]He can just free load.

Read full topic

Are you joking with the strength level?

I must agree with him, your strength level will most likely be too low

At floor 1 - 19 it’d be fine, but when ur reaching high floors (around 40 or so) then you’d probably be killed because ur hits are too low to kill him…

And yeah, the necklace and bonecrusher sound pretty epic I might get them myself too

item.title: Dungoneering Reward Question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Lol was reading the wiki altar:
The necklace can be used together with the Bonecrusher to gain a prayer point every time you kill a monster that drops Bones as remains. This can be useful to sustain prayer for longer periods of time in combat.

That’s pretty epic (would be better with higher level ones though)

Read full topic

I don’t think your aloud to bury bones in there.
